inclusion.criterion: Patient is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is willing and able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is willing and able to comply with the protocol, including follow-up visits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient is enrolled in another study that could confound the results of this study,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: without documented pre-approval from a study manager
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient has existing IPG, ICD, CRT-D or CRT-P device
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
